thread.title: Ohad Dudaie

author: Ohad Dudaie
title: Ohad Dudaie
text:
Hi,
I must say that the web site looks very neat and very friendly.
I had a very nice experience when i made a reservation, besides the fact that i couldn't find the way how to use my promotional code - as a new GoldCar member.
I navigated to help / FAQ - but the explanations were not as much as accurate to my screen shots.
I have a promotional code that i wish to use (â‚¬10), but till this point I can execute.
I will be happy to know that I can use it for this purchase.
BR,
Ohad
